LoginPage.description: This is the login page for OrangeHRM. Users can enter their username and password to access the system.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Forgot your password?
elements.description: Link to navigate to the 'Forgot Password' page.

OrangehrmDashboardPage.description: The Dashboard page of OrangeHRM provides a central overview of key information and quick actions for the user.

elements.name: Dashboard Header
elements.description: The main header text on the Dashboard page.

elements.name: Time at Work Card
elements.description: Container displaying the user's time at work information.

elements.name: My Actions Card
elements.description: Container displaying the user's pending actions.

elements.name: Quick Launch Card
elements.description: Container displaying the quick launch options.

elements.name: Buzz Latest Posts Card
elements.description: Container displaying the latest posts from the Buzz module.

elements.name: Assign Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to navigate to the Assign Leave page.

elements.name: Leave List Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to navigate to the Leave List page.

elements.name: Timesheets Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to navigate to the Timesheets page.

elements.name: Apply Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to navigate to the Apply Leave page.

elements.name: My Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to navigate to the My Leave page.

elements.name: My Timesheet Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to navigate to the My Timesheet page.

assertions: Time at Work card is displayed
Buzz Latest Posts card is displayed

EmployeeListPage.description: This is the Employee List page within the PIM module, where users can view, search, and manage employee records.

elements.name: Employee Name Input
elements.description: Input field for filtering employees by name.

elements.name: Employee Id Input
elements.description: Input field for filtering employees by ID.

elements.name: Employment Status Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by employment status.

elements.name: Include Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by inclusion criteria (e.g., Current Employees Only).

elements.name: Supervisor Name Input
elements.description: Input field for filtering employees by supervisor name.

elements.name: Job Title Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by job title.

elements.name: Sub Unit Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by sub unit.

elements.name: Reset Button
elements.description: Button to reset the filter criteria.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to apply the filter criteria and search for employees.

elements.name: Add Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Add Employee page.

elements.name: Employee List Table
elements.description: Table displaying the list of employees.

assertions: The employee list table is displayed

AddEmployeeOrangehrmPage.description: This page is used to add a new employee to the OrangeHRM system.

elements.name: Add Employee Header
elements.description: The main header of the Add Employee page.

elements.name: First Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the employee's first name.

elements.name: Middle Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the employee's middle name.

elements.name: Last Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the employee's last name.

elements.name: Employee Id Input
elements.description: Input field for the employee's ID.

assertions: Assert that the page title is 'OrangeHRM'
Assert that the 'Add Employee' header is displayed
Assert that the First Name input field is present
Assert that the Last Name input field is present

PimPersonalDetailsPage.description: This page allows users to view and modify the personal details of an employee.

elements.name: First Name
elements.description: Input field for the employee's first name.

elements.name: Middle Name
elements.description: Input field for the employee's middle name.

elements.name: Last Name
elements.description: Input field for the employee's last name.

elements.name: Employee Id
elements.description: Input field for the employee's ID.

elements.name: Other Id
elements.description: Input field for the employee's other ID.

elements.name: Driver's License Number
elements.description: Input field for the employee's driver's license number.

elements.name: License Expiry Date
elements.description: Input field for the employee's license expiry date.

elements.name: Nationality
elements.primary_locator: div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1)
elements.backup_locator: div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1)
elements.description: Dropdown for selecting the employee's nationality.

elements.name: Marital Status
elements.primary_locator: div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1)
elements.backup_locator: div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1)
elements.description: Dropdown for selecting the employee's marital status.

elements.name: Date of Birth
elements.description: Input field for the employee's date of birth.

elements.name: Male Gender
elements.backup_locator: div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > label
elements.description: Radio button for selecting male gender.

elements.name: Female Gender
elements.backup_locator: div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > label
elements.description: Radio button for selecting female gender.

elements.name: Save Button
elements.description: Button to save the personal details.

elements.name: Personal Details Tab
elements.description: Link to the Personal Details tab.

elements.name: Contact Details Tab
elements.description: Link to the Contact Details tab.

elements.name: Emergency Contacts Tab
elements.description: Link to the Emergency Contacts tab.

elements.name: Dependents Tab
elements.description: Link to the Dependents tab.

elements.name: Immigration Tab
elements.description: Link to the Immigration tab.

elements.name: Job Tab
elements.description: Link to the Job tab.

elements.name: Salary Tab
elements.description: Link to the Salary tab.

elements.name: Report-to Tab
elements.description: Link to the Report-to tab.

elements.name: Qualifications Tab
elements.description: Link to the Qualifications tab.

elements.name: Memberships Tab
elements.description: Link to the Memberships tab.

assertions: Assert that the page title contains 'OrangeHRM'
Assert that the 'Personal Details' header is displayed
Assert that the 'First Name' field is present
Assert that the 'Save' button is present

OrangehrmSystemUsersPage.description: This page allows administrators to manage system users, including searching, adding, editing, and deleting users.

elements.name: Username Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter users by username.

elements.name: User Role Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter users by role.

elements.name: Employee Name Filter
elements.description: Input field to filter users by employee name.

elements.name: Status Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter users by status.

elements.name: Reset Button
elements.description: Button to reset the filter criteria.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to apply the filter criteria.

elements.name: Add Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Add User page.

elements.name: Username Column Header
elements.description: Column header for Username.

elements.name: User Role Column Header
elements.description: Column header for User Role.

elements.name: Employee Name Column Header
elements.description: Column header for Employee Name.

elements.name: Status Column Header
elements.description: Column header for Status.

AddUserPage.description: This page is used to add a new user to the OrangeHRM system.

elements.name: User Role Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to select the user role (Admin or ESS).

elements.name: Employee Name Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the employee's name.

elements.name: Status Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to select the user's status (Enabled or Disabled).

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the password.

elements.name: Confirm Password Input
elements.description: Input field for confirming the password.

elements.name: Cancel Button
elements.description: Button to cancel adding a new user.

elements.name: Save Button
elements.description: Button to save the new user.
